text: Nimen zai nali faxian tamen, jiu zai nali shalu tamen; bing jiang tamen zhu chu jingwai, youru tamen congqian quzhu nimen yiyang, pohai shi bi shalu geng canku de. Nimen buyao zai jin si fujin he tamen zhandou, zhidao tamen zai nali jingong nimen; ruguo tamen jingong nimen, nimen jiu yingdang shalu tamen. Bu xindao zhe de baochou shi zheyang de.
